    • Highlights

    • Explore the charming hill town of Shillong, known as the "Scotland of the East."
    • Visit Cherrapunji, one of the wettest places on earth, famous for its living root bridges and waterfalls.
    • Experience the crystal-clear waters of Dawki and the serene beauty of Umngot River.
    • Discover the breathtaking landscapes, caves, and tribal culture of Meghalaya.

    Mystic Meghalaya Tour - 6 Nights / 7 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Shillong

    • Arrive in Shillong and transfer to your hotel.
    • Explore the local markets and visit Ward's Lake.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Shillong.

    Day 2: Shillong Sightseeing

    • After breakfast, visit Shillong Peak for panoramic views of the city.
    • Explore Elephant Falls and the Don Bosco Museum of Indigenous Cultures.
    • Evening free for leisure or shopping at Police Bazaar.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Shillong.

    Day 3: Shillong to Cherrapunji

    • Drive to Cherrapunji, known for its lush landscapes and abundant rainfall.
    • Visit Nohkalikai Falls, Seven Sisters Falls, and Mawsmai Cave.
    • Explore the unique landscape and enjoy the misty weather.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Cherrapunji.

    Day 4: Living Root Bridge and Mawlynnong Village

    • Visit the famous Living Root Bridge at Nongriat and trek through the scenic route.
    • Continue to Mawlynnong Village, Asia's cleanest village, and experience the local lifestyle.
    • Return to Cherrapunji for an overnight stay.

    Day 5: Dawki and Umngot River

    • Head to Dawki, known for the clear waters of the Umngot River.
    • Enjoy a boat ride on the crystal-clear river and take in the scenic beauty.
    • Return to Shillong for an overnight stay.

    Day 6: Day at Leisure in Shillong

    • Free day to explore Shillong at your own pace.
    • Optional visits to nearby attractions or relax and enjoy the local cuisine.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Shillong.

    Day 7: Departure from Shillong

    • After breakfast, check out and transfer to the airport or railway station for departure.
    • End of the Mystic Meghalaya Tour.
